en.dWSAppStatusMsg: You can continue with your divorce
en.dWSAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application to 'dispense with service' (decided that your {{ case.divorceWho }} doesn’t have to be served the divorce application).
en.dWSAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application to 'dispense with service' (decided that your {{ case.divorceWho }} doesn’t have to be served the amended divorce application).
en.dWSAppStatusMsgDetails2: You can now continue the divorce without their response.

cy.dWSAppStatusMsgDetails1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich cais i 'hepgor cyflwyno' (penderfynu nad oes rhaid cyflwyno'r cais am ysgariad i'ch {{ case.divorceWho }}).
cy.dWSAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich cais i 'hepgor cyflwyno' (penderfynu nad oes rhaid cyflwyno'r cais diwygiedig am ysgariad i'ch {{ case.divorceWho }}).
cy.dWSAppStatusMsgDetails2: Gallwch nawr barhau â’r ysgariad heb eu hymateb.
